venue.details: It is a home to New York Yankees, MLB team and NYC FC, MLS team, located in the Concourse neighborhood. This stadium has hosted numerous concerts and football matches.

restaurants_bars.name: Hard Rock Cafe
restaurants_bars.description: Located within the stadium, offers American fare & cocktails plus rock 'n' roll memorabilia.

restaurants_bars.name: YANKEE TAVERN
restaurants_bars.description: Sports bar with Yankees photos since 1923 offering beers on tap & pub grub such as burgers & wings.

accommodations.name: Holiday Inn Express - Bronx NYC - Yankee Stadium
accommodations.description: Located in nearby neighbourhood within walking distance to Yankee Stadium.

accommodations.name: Comfort Inn & Suites near Stadium
accommodations.description: Hotel with fitness centre, 24/7 front desk, walking distance to Yankee Stadium.

tourist_attractions.name: Bronx Museum of Arts
tourist_attractions.description: Contemporary art museum in Bronx, located near Yankee Stadium.

options.description: B, D train at 161 Street - Yankee Stadium Station.
Bx6 and Bx13 at East 161 Street / River Avenue.

venue.details: It is a multi-purpose indoor arena located in Midtown Manhattan, named because the team's first home, the Madison Avenue was named for President James Madison.

restaurants_bars.name: Clyde Frazier's Wine and Dine
restaurants_bars.description: Sporty spot for gourmet burgers & sushi with basketball-decor & a court for shooting hoops.

restaurants_bars.name: Pennsy Food Hall
restaurants_bars.description: High-end food court featuring cuisine from top chefs, outdoor patio & bar with daily happy hour.

accommodations.name: Hotel Pennsylvania
accommodations.description: Opposite Madison Square Garden and Penn Station, this classic Midtown Manhattan hotel is a 7-minute walk from the Empire State Building.
